subtitle: You can serve this Mexican-inspired soup hot or chilled - whichever you prefer.

method.text: Halve the avocados. Remove the stone. Scoop the flesh out into a food processor. Add the onion and garlic. Process until smooth. Pour in half the cream and process until smooth. Add the remaining cream and process until well mixed.
Place the stock, sherry and seasoning in a large saucepan and slowly bring to the boil. Remove from the heat. Whisk in the avocado mixture. Heat very gently for 1-2 min but do not boil.
Meanwhile, arrange the tortilla chips on a grill pan and sprinkle over the chilli and Cheddar cheese. Place under a preheated medium grill for 1-2 min until golden and the cheese has melted.
Spoon the avocado soup into warmed soup bowls. Sprinkle over a little coriander and chilli. Serve immediately with the cheesy tortilla chips.

title: Avocado soup with cheesy tortilla chips
